fields.name: Sheep’s Clothing (Passive):
fields.value: in addition to this role’s abilities, you will receive those of a random town role. You will appear as this role in investigations.

fields.name: Hit:
fields.value: Attack a target with your attack power.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Live until the end of the game having killed a town player at night and having voted for a town player in over half of the days.
